inclusion.criterion: Core biopsy proven invasive breast cancer OR Core biopsy proven low or intermediate grade DCIS.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Tumor less than or equal to 2.0 cm in diameter.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No prior surgical treatment for breast cancer within 30 days.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy of > 10 years, not including the diagnosis of cancer.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Multifocal invasive breast cancer patients are eligible. All tumors that are palpable or visualized by USS can be treated.
inclusion.label: met

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer. HER2-positive and ER/PR negative.
